fields.name: Organic Maple Syrup
fields.description:
Organic Maple Syrup 1 Litre
Organic Pure 100% Canadian Maple Syrup from Vertmont delivers a lush, toffee-like flavor that serves as an ideal complement to a variety of dishes. Whether drizzled over pancakes, ice cream, yogurt, waffles, muffins, cereal, or fruit salads, this natural sweetener adds a touch of richness.

Additionally, it enhances the flavor of salad dressings and acts as a delightful, guilt-free addition to both hot and cold beverages.

Uses
Glazes for Meats and Vegetables: Add a sweet touch to meats or roasted veggies.
Homemade Granola: Sweeten your granola mix with maple syrup.
Salad Dressings: Mix into vinaigrettes for a sweet twist.
Baking: Substitute for sugar in recipes like cookies and cakes.
Cocktails: Use as a natural sweetener in drinks like Old Fashioneds or whiskey sours.

Size
1 Litre (1.32kg)


Ingredients
Pure Maple Syrup

Product of Canada.

fields.name: Olvia Extra Virgin Organic Olive Oil 5L
fields.description:
Olvia Extra Virgin Organic Olive Oil 5L
Olvia organic extra virgin olive oil is produced from the Greek varieties Adramitini and Colovi that are cultivated in the hillside groves of the Tzortzis family on the Island of Lesvos at the Northern Aegean Sea. Olvia is a delightful olive oil that preserves its distinct local character. It has a golden colour, complimented by a pleasantly mild flavour and lively grassy aromas. A long aftertaste adds to the appreciation. With all its goodness, Olvia brings quality and finesse to your diet delivering all the health benefits which olive oil is renowned for.

Country of Origin - Greece
fields.materials:

fields.name: Organic Rice White Basmati 5kg
fields.description:
Organic White Basmati Rice 5kg
Organic White Basmati Rice is a culinary treasure, renowned for its delicate aroma, fluffy texture, and exceptional flavor.

This long-grain rice is a staple in Indian cuisine, perfectly complementing curries, stir-fries, and biryanis. It is also a versatile ingredient for salads, pilafs, and a variety of global dishes.

The 5kg pack ensures a plentiful supply for your culinary adventures while promoting sustainability by reducing plastic waste compared to purchasing multiple smaller packs.


Perfect for
Creating fragrant and fluffy basmati rice to accompany curries, stir-fries, and biryanis.
Enhancing salads, pilafs, and grain bowls with its delicate aroma and fluffy texture.
Serving as a base for a variety of global dishes, from Asian-inspired stir-fries to Mediterranean-style salads.

Storage Tips
Store in a cool, dry place.
Transfer to airtight containers.
Label with best before and purchase date.

Ingredients
Organic White Basmati Rice

fields.name: Fresh (raw) Organic Turmeric Root (Peru) 1kg
fields.description:
Fresh Turmeric Root (often miss-spelled as Tumeric) has a peppery, warm and bitter flavour and a mild fragrance. It is best known as one of the ingredients used to make curry and also gives mustard its bright yellow colour.

Please Note: For orders of 1KG and over of Turmeric, please be aware that your order might be delayed for a few days, as we only get limited quantities to keep it fresh. 

Origin: Peru. Certified Organic.

fields.name: Organico Bakery Seedy Spelt Sourdough Bread
fields.description:
Seedy Spelt Sourdough Bread
Created by our artisan bakers, this Seedy Spelt Sourdough bread is made with organic flour, filtered water and sea salt.


To refresh your bread
Take the loaves you want to use out of their packaging, and lightly sprinkle with some water
Pop in a preheated oven (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes 
Allow to cool and enjoy
Put any remaining loaves in the freezer to main their freshness

Please note
we ship freshly baked bread on Tuesdays and Wednesdays with An Post, and delivery is often next day but this cannot be guaranteed.

We will bag each bread to ensure maximum freshness. 

Please keep wrapped and in the fridge after arrival.


Ingredients
White spelt flour*, wholemeal flour*, pumpkin*, sunflower*, linseed*, sesame*, filtered water, salt

*organic

Allergens in bold

fields.name: Monki Organic Almond Butter (330g)
fields.description:
Monki Organic Almond Butter (330g)

This almond butter spread is an organic product which is formulated using only the finest, organically-grown almonds. It is dairy and gluten free. It has an exceptionally rich flavour and colour and tastes great when spread on bread, rice cakes or crackers.

Monki Organic Almond Butter Spread is suitable for both vegans and vegetarians. Almonds like most nuts contain unsaturated fatty acids and other nutrients which help to lower bad cholesterol. High levels of bad cholesterol are one of the primary causes of heart disease. Dairy based spreads tend to contain a high percentage of bad fats which contribute to high cholesterol levels. Monki Organic Almond Butter Spread is a great alternative to dairy based spreads.

Ingredients: Roasted almonds and sea salt. Nutritional information Per 100g: Energy 2610kJ, Protein 20g, Fat 59g, Carbohydrates 5g. Warnings: This butter should not be consumed by individuals with nut allergies.

Warnings: This butter should not be consumed by individuals with nut allergies.

fields.name: Clipper Everyday Tea Organic 80 Bags
fields.description:
Organic Everyday Tea 80 Bags
A deliciously refreshing and full-bodied blend of quality black teas, sourced from the finest organic tea gardens. Tea, as it should naturally be.

Clipper is dedicated to bringing you delicious teas that are beautiful inside and out. They consider everything from the sourcing of all of their ingredients, where the tea comes from, to the way they blend and pack it; whilst always upholding their policy of ‘no artificial ingredients’.

They have become the UK’s 1st Fairtrade tea brand and champion the very recognisable unbleached tea bag.

This is the tea we use in Organico Cafe - it's a great everyday cuppa!


Ingredients 
Organically grown black tea


Brewing Instructions 
Always use fresh water, pour it over the tea bag while it's still boiling and allow to brew for 2-4 minutes. The rest is up to you.

fields.name: Sonnentor Organic Whole Beans Espresso Coffee 1kg
fields.description:
Sonnentor Organic Wiener Verführung Whole Beans Espresso Coffee 1kg
Sonnentor Wiener Verführung Espresso is a strong coffee blend made from fine organic Arabica beans. A coffee experience with a full body and a strong roasted note. In addition to the velvety crema, the espresso is characterized by a dark chocolate note.

The espresso blend is a strong, aromatic organic coffee experience "par excellence"! Not only recommended as a fragrant seduction for a cozy breakfast or a coffee break. Also try to refine the coffee blend with spices or honey. Oriental and spicy with cardamom, or sensually spicy with cinnamon or vanilla. Irish coffee with whiskey or Pharisee with brown rum is an international specialty. In summer, of course, don't forget the wonderfully fresh iced coffee. In modern cuisine you can of course also use the Wiener Verführung for fine desserts. Try it for an exquisite parfait or mousse. Italian tiramisu can hardly be imagined without its typical aroma.


Ingredients
Bean coffee*, whole beans
* From certified organic farming.
fields.materials:

Sonnentor Wiener Verführung Espresso is a strong coffee blend made from fine organic Arabica beans. A coffee experience with a full body and a strong roasted note. In addition to the velvety crema, the espresso is characterized by a dark chocolate note.

The espresso blend is a strong, aromatic organic coffee experience "par excellence"! Not only recommended as a fragrant seduction for a cozy breakfast or a coffee break. fields.name: Oatly Oat Drink Barista Edition 1L
fields.description:
Oatly Oat Drink Barista Edition 1L
This oat drink is based on liquid oats which means it isn’t overly sweet or excessively heavy.

It is fully foamable putting you in total control over the density and performance of your foam so you can showcase your latte art skills.

Also suitable for non baristas - just heat this barista edition oat drink in a container while giving it a whirl until it foams up nicely and then pour yourself a latte without milk.


Ingredients
Oat base (water, oats 10 %), rapeseed oil, acidity regulator (dipotassium phosphate), calcium carbonate, calcium phosphates, iodised salt, vitamins (D2, riboflavin and B12)


Allergens
See ingredients in BOLD
Free from lactose, milk protein and soya.

fields.name: Clipper House Blend Organic Instant Coffee 100g
fields.description:
Clipper House Blend Organic Instant Coffee 100g
A toasty and intense blend with a wonderfully smooth, clean finish and rich aroma.


Ethically Sourced
Making the world a fairer place sip by sip. We have been working with Fairtrade since 1994 and today we are very proud to be the world’s largest Fairtrade tea brand.

Clipper products are sourced and made with a clear conscience. We constantly strive to improve the welfare of the workers, whilst helping improving standards in education, health & housing.


Ingredients
Freeze dried organic instant coffee, coffee oil (0.1%)

fields.name: Luna and Terra White Cabbage Sauerkraut Juice 700ml
fields.description:
Luna and Terra White Cabbage Sauerkraut Juice 700ml
Biodynamic goes a step further than organic: Demeter certified farmers must meet extra high requirements. Near the Elbe in northern Germany, freshly squeezed juices are made on a non-profit basis. The biodynamic growers work year after year to build up a living soil from which they and future generations can harvest.

The caggages are deeply rooted in the open ground and are naturally strong. Immediately after harvesting, the fully grown vegetables are pressed. The juice therefore does not come from concentrate and is heated briefly to extend its shelf life. Tasteful, full-fledged and vital juices from close to nature.  Lactic acid bacteria convert the natural sugars from the juice into lactic acid.


Ingredients
Sauerkraut juice** (99.4%), sea salt (0.6%). ** = Demeter


Nutritional values
Energy    50 kcal (12 kJ)
Fat    0 grams
Fat saturated    0 grams
Fat monounsaturated    0 grams
Fat polyunsaturated    0 grams
Carbohydrates    1.5 grams
Sugars    1 gram
Dietary fiber    0 grams
Egg white    1 gram
Salty    0 grams

The caggages are deeply rooted in the open ground and are naturally strong. Immediately after harvesting, the fully grown vegetables are pressed. The juice therefore does not come from concentrate and is heated briefly to extend its shelf life. Tasteful, full-fledged and vital juices from close to nature.  Lactic acid bacteria convert the natural sugars from the juice into lactic acid.

fields.name: Clipper Pure Green Tea Organic 80 Unbleached Bags
fields.description:
Clipper Organic Pure Green Tea (80 Unbleached Bags)

This light and delicate pure green tea, with a bright golden colour, tastes as good as it looks in the cup.

Preparation and Usage

How to make the perfect cup of green tea: Always use fresh water, boil and leave to cool for a minute before pouring over the tea bag. Allow to infuse for 1-3 minutes.

Organic, Fairtrade, Natural, fair & delicious, Drink your greens!

fields.name: Trafo Organic Truffle Potato Chips 100g
fields.description:
Organic Truffle Potato Chips 100g
These potato chips have a delicious subtle truffle taste of real truffle.

Trafo uses the best quality potatoes and then processes them according to a traditional recipe and authentic baking process.

The chips are cut slightly thicker, which ensures tasty crispy chips with a firm bite.


Ingredients

fields.description:
Panda All Natural Soft Liquorice (240g Bag)

Less than 0.5% Fat
No Added Preservatives or additives
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans
Panda All Natural Soft Liquorice Bar is made with Premium quality soft Liquorice lovingly made with natural colours and flavours. Great tasting liquorice, as pure as it comes!

Panda Liquorice contains less than 0.5% fat, no white sugar or preservatives. It is Kosher and suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Organic Plain White Flour is a pantry essential, offering a versatile texture and a neutral flavor that complements a wide range of baking and culinary creations.

The 5kg pack ensures a plentiful supply for your baking needs.

Label with best before and purchase date.

fields.name: Black & Blum - Lunch Box Original Ocean
fields.description:
Black & Blum - Lunch Box Original (Ocean)

A 1 L / 34 fl oz lunch box that makes it easy to organise your lunch and presents your food beautifully.

Features:

100% leakproof

Includes stainless-steel fork, inner compartment and leak-proof sauce pot

Microwave, dishwasher & freezer safe

BPA free

The Black + Blum 1L Lunch Box Original in Olive is the first truly leak-proof stainless-steel lunch box. This 3 in 1 multi-functional lunch box allows you to transport your lunch, cook dishes in the oven, and even store pre-cooked meals in the freezer. The vacuum valve on the top of the lid offers risk-free, leak proof functionality Also includes and interior divider to keep foods separate and has a stainless-steel fork attached securely by a colored silicone strap.
fields.materials:
Black & Blum - Lunch Box Original (Ocean)

A 1 L / 34 fl oz lunch box that makes it easy to organise your lunch and presents your food beautifully.

Features:

  • 100% leakproof

  • Includes stainless-steel fork, inner compartment and leak-proof sauce pot

  • Microwave, dishwasher & freezer safe

  • BPA free

The Black + Blum 1L Lunch Box Original in Olive is the first truly leak-proof stainless-steel lunch box. This 3 in 1 multi-functional lunch box allows you to transport your lunch, cook dishes in the oven, and even store pre-cooked meals in the freezer. The vacuum valve on the top of the lid offers risk-free, leak proof functionality Also includes and interior divider to keep foods separate and has a stainless-steel fork attached securely by a colored silicone strap.

fields.name: sonett laundry liquid lavender 5l
fields.description:
Sonett Laundry Liquid Lavender 5L
Suitable for all textiles made from cotton, linen, hemp, and fabric blends.

The ingredients sugar surfactant and coconut oil alcohol sulphate are cleaning substances which, next to soap, are the most easily degradable and skin-friendliest ones.

They work well, irrespective of the degree of water hardness, which makes this liquid detergent especially indicated for hard water.

30–95 °C (85–200 °F)


We think Sonett make the best natural cleaning products - here's why: 

They are hypoallergenic & 100% biodegradable.
They are made from organic vegetable oils from European farms.
They are extremely concentrated & made with less water than their competitors.
They are made with consideration for the waste water - so they actually BENEFIT the environment.
They are fragrenced using natural essential oils, originating 100% from certified organic cultivation and wild-growing plants.

Ranges of application
Suitable for all coloured and white textiles made from cotton, linen, hemp and fabric blends of between
30 and 95 °C (85–200 °F).
Suitable for HE washing machines.


Application
Fill Softener into the detergent compartment of the washing machine and Laundry Liquid into a measuring ball and put it straight into the drum.


Ingredients
Aqua, potassium soap*, alkylpolyglucoside C8–16, sodium
C8–14, fatty alcohol sulphate, alcohol, sulphated castor oil, potassium citrate, perfume* (fragrance), linalool*
*certified organically grown
fields.materials:
Sonett Laundry Liquid Lavender 5L

Suitable for all textiles made from cotton, linen, hemp, and fabric blends.

The ingredients sugar surfactant and coconut oil alcohol sulphate are cleaning substances which, next to soap, are the most easily degradable and skin-friendliest ones.

They work well, irrespective of the degree of water hardness, which makes this liquid detergent especially indicated for hard water.

30–95 °C (85–200 °F)


We think Sonett make the best natural cleaning products - here's why: 

  • They are hypoallergenic & 100% biodegradable.
  • They are made from organic vegetable oils from European farms.
  • They are extremely concentrated & made with less water than their competitors.
  • They are made with consideration for the waste water - so they actually BENEFIT the environment.
  • They are fragrenced using natural essential oils, originating 100% from certified organic cultivation and wild-growing plants.


Ranges of application

Suitable for all coloured and white textiles made from cotton, linen, hemp and fabric blends of between
30 and 95 °C (85–200 °F).
Suitable for HE washing machines.


Application

Fill Softener into the detergent compartment of the washing machine and Laundry Liquid into a measuring ball and put it straight into the drum.


Ingredients

Aqua, potassium soap*, alkylpolyglucoside C8–16, sodium
C8–14, fatty alcohol sulphate, alcohol, sulphated castor oil, potassium citrate, perfume* (fragrance), linalool*
*certified organically grown

fields.name: ocean saver laundry detergent ecosheets 15 sheets (30 washes)
fields.description:
Ocean Saver Laundry Detergent Ecosheets 15 sheets (30 washes)
A concentrated sheet form of laundry detergent, made with a powerful plant-based formula. They clean, remove stains, and freshen every time, even on cold washes and with delicate clothes such as silks and wools.

This pack contains laundry sheets for 30 washes - that's just 22p per wash! 


Directions
Each Strip / Half Sheet is best used for 1 Medium load (About Half Drum / 3.5-4kg); One Full Sheet (2 Strips) is best used for large load (About 3/4 - Full Drum / 7-7.5kg)


Ingredients
Oxygen-based bleaching agents >=5 - <15% Non-ionic surfactants, enzymes <5% Also contains : sequestrants, carbonate salts, sulfate salts, citric acid, silicates, antiredeposition agents, salt, glycerin, sodium glycolate, anionic surfactants, magnesium stearate, bentonite.

fields.name: Yarrah Organic Dried Chicken Necks for Dogs (150g)
fields.description:
Yarrah Organic Chicken Snack for Dogs (150g) - A dog snack with 100% organic chicken necks for all types of dogs, from puppies to older dogs. A delicious dried snack that scrubs the teeth and removes plaque. A pure snack, free from artificial additives, pesticides and GMO.

Yarrah has been producing organic dog and cat food since 1992. Not just for the sake of it, but as a deliberate and conscious attempt to lead the way towards positive change. Farms are personally checked to maintain a close relationship and to continuously improve the quality of the organic products. No hidden ingredients, no chemical additives, just pure organic food for dogs and cats since 1992.

Ingredients
100% organic chicken

fields.name: NaturesPlus Source of Life Liquid Gold 900ml
fields.description:
NaturesPlus Source of Life Liquid Gold 900ml
Unleash a new burst of life and health with Nature's Plus Source of Life Gold - the ultimate whole food-based multivitamin supplement. With its revolutionary new all-natural ingredients, this supplement delivers unparalleled antioxidant, anti-aging and energizing power. And, with its irresistible tropical fruit flavor, Source of Life Gold Liquid is not only effective but also enjoyable.

Source of Life Gold takes whole food multivitamin supplementation to a new level. Building on the success of Nature's Plus' pioneering Source of Life, Source of Life Red and Ultra Source of Life formulas, this supplement represents the next quantum leap in natural nutrition. Featuring a complete daily vitamin profile, including vitamin B12, A, C, D3, and K2, Source of Life Gold delivers the ultimate in high potency, whole food-based vitamins.


Directions
30ml per day


Ingredients
Vitamin B12 1000 mcg for blood support

Vitamin A (as beta carotene and mixed carotenoids from spirulina and Dunaliella salina) Natural sources of vitamin A, including many carotenoid cofactors for superior activity

Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid; esterified C [ascorbyl palmitate])

Vitamin D3 (as cholecalciferol) 1000 IU of vegetarian vitamin D3 for bone, immune and overall health benefits

Vitamin K2 Blood supporting and bone building, natural vitamin K2 in the two most bioavailable forms as menaquinone-4 (m4) and menaquinone-7 (m7)

Organic Gold Standard B Vitamins Innovative new methods of concentrating the water soluble vitamins within organic holy basil, lemon, and guava yields a B-complex blend of unprecedented potency.

Trans-Resveratrol Complex from Polygonum cuspidatum, grape seed and red wine (alcohol free)

Organic Mushroom Blend immune-boosting myconutrients from certified organic whole food mushrooms

Whole Food Omega Fatty Acids Chia, spirulina, sunflower seed, black currant, borage and flax provide 13 mg of omega and other healthful fatty acids.

More than 120 colorful fruits and vegetables Nature's Plus pioneered the addition of synergistic whole food phytonutrients to vitamin and mineral supplements. Whole food benefits remain a cornerstone of the Source of Life brand. Nowhere is this concept executed with greater abundance and variety than in the Source of LifeGOLD line of products. Source of Life GOLD delivers energizing, health-enhancing phytonutrient benefits from more than 120 whole food concentrates and extracts of the world's greatest green, red, blue, yellow and white fruits and vegetables. Organically Bound Minerals Each serving of Source of Life Gold provides a specialized array of organically bound minerals for superior absorption, including whole brown rice amino acid chelates.

Full Spectrum Prebiotic Complex FOS (fructooligosaccharides), apple pectin, modified citrus pectin, soluble vegetable oligosaccharides, flax

Enzyme-Rich Whole Food Blend Pineapple, papaya, beet juice, turmeric, parsley, ginger

Amino Acids a complete array of all essential and non-essential amino acids, from spirulina, Whole Food PhytoAlgae, chia and mineral aminoates ORAC Value 1250 Oxygen Radical Absorbance Capacity is a measure of anti-oxidant activity.

fields.name: ITL Health PrizMAG Pure Magnesium Bisglycinate 150 Vegan Caps
fields.description:
PrizMAG Pure Magnesium Bisglycinate 150 Vegan Caps
Magnesium supports normal healthy nervous system and muscle function. It also contributes to the maintenance of normal bones and teeth.


Directions
Take 3-4 capsules daily, or as directed by a healthcare practitioner. Intake can be taken at one time or separately throughout the day. Do not exceed the recommended daily intake.

Do not use this product before consulting your doctor if you are pregnant, breastfeeding or taking any medication.

Do not give this product to a child under two years of age before consulting your pediatric doctor.

A food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied, balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.


Ingredients
Pure Magnesium Bisglycinate (no magnesium oxide), Pullulan (vegan capsule made from fermented tapioca)

fields.name: NaturesPlus Pro Berberine 750mg (60 Caps)
fields.description:
NaturesPlus Pro Berberine 750mg 30 servings - 60 caps
Berberine is a versatile compound found in many plants. But if you’re going to enjoy the benefits of this powerful substance, you need the real deal…that’s why NP Berberine 750 provides active berberine derived from Berberis aristata, a plant with a unique bioactive yellow pigment.

Active and Sustainable: Each 2 capsule serving delivers 750 mg of active berberine (from 833 mg of berberine HCI) per easy-to-swallow capsule taken from Berberis aristata, a sustainable source.
Pure and Natural: Free from synthetic colours and preservatives as well as milk, eggs, cereals containing gluten, fish, crustaceans, peanuts, soyabeans, tree nuts, celery, mustard, sesame seed, lupin, molluscs, sulphur dioxide and sulphites.
30 Servings Per Container
Gluten Free
Vegan and Vegetarian
Non-GMO

Directions
Take two capsules daily or as recommended by your healthcare professional


Ingredients
Please see images

fields.name: Udo’s Choice Super 8 Microbiotic IMMUNE 60 Caps
fields.description:
Udo’s Choice Super 8 Microbiotic IMMUNE 60 Capsules
Find Super 8 in the fridge of your local Health Food Store

Udo’s Choice® Super 8 contains 42 billion 'friendly' bacteria per daily capsule and 8 strains of lacto and bifido bacteria including Lactobacillus acidophilus, Rhamnosus, plantarum and Bifidobacterium bifidum and longum.

Super 8 microbiotic is ideal for both every day use and short periods throughout the year.


Key benefits include 
42 billion 'friendly' bacteria per capsule
8 strains of lacto and bifido bacteria 
Gastric Guard Guarantee – bacteria is guaranteed to survive passage through stomach acid
Suitable from 5+ years

Did you know? 
Super 8 is safe to take while pregnant or breastfeeding and suitable for vegetarians.

 
Udos Choice Super 8 is a hi-count microbiotic blend that contains eight strains of lacto and bifido bacteria. Each daily capsule contains 42 billion 'friendly' bacteria & 15mg of Vitamin C.

Ingredients:

Lactobacillus acidophilus 45%
Lactobacillus rhamnosus HA-111 25%
Lactobacillus rhamnosus HA-114 10%
Lactobacillus plantarum 7%
Bifidobacterium bifidum 6%
Bifidobacterium longum 3%
Lactobacillus casei 3% 
Lactobacillus salivarius 1%
Vitamin C 15mg

fields.name: Nordic Naturals Ultimate Omega D3 120 Soft Gels
fields.description:
Nordic Naturals Ultimate Omega D3 120 Soft Gels
Ultimate Omega®-D3 combines healthy doses of two essential nutrients for optimal wellness, omega-3 EPA+DHA and vitamin D3, in a concentrated serving.*

1280 mg total omega-3s; 1000 IU Vitamin D3
Our most popular concentrate, recommended by doctors worldwide
High-intensity support for the heart, brain, and bones*
Made exclusively from 100% wild-caught sardines and anchovies
Added vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol)
Fresh lemon taste
Award Winner! Better Nutrition magazine's Best Essential Fatty Acid Supplement Award

Directions
Two soft gels daily, with food, or as directed by your healthcare professional or pharmacist.


Supplement Facts

Serving Size: 2 Soft Gels

Amount Per Serving	 	% Daily Value**
Calories	20	 
Total Fat	2g	3%
Saturated Fat	0g	0%
Trans Fat	0g	†
Vitamin D3	25 mcg (1000 IU)	125%
Total Omega-3s	1280 mg	†
EPA (Eicosapentaenoic Acid)	650 mg	†
DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid)	450 mg	†
Other Omega-3s	180 mg	†

**Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.

† Daily Value not established.

Less than 5 mg of Cholesterol per serving.


Ingredients
Purified deep sea fish oil (from anchovies and sardines), soft gel capsule (gelatin, glycerin, water, natural lemon flavor), natural lemon flavor, d-alpha tocopherol (antioxidant), vitamin D3 (olive oil, cholecalciferol), rosemary extract (a natural preservative).

No gluten, milk derivatives, or artificial colors or flavors.

fields.name: Altrient C Liposomal Vitamin C 30 Sachets
fields.description:
Altrient C Liposomal Vitamin C 30 Sachets
Most ordinary forms of oral Vitamin C – tablets, capsules, powders, liquids and even dietary sources are not metabolised efficiently due to tightly regulated absorption controls in the body. This means that levels of vitamin C in the intestines reaches saturation point at as little as 200mg. In fact, the more we take in the less we absorb. Thus, very little reaches your blood stream let alone the cells where it is needed most.

Until recently intravenous delivery of vitamin C has proven to be the most effective route for absorption, but this method is both costly and impractical. Altrient C offers the perfect solution because of its scientifically proven liposomal delivery method. This powerful form of transportation encapsulates the nutrient in a microscopic phospholipid bubble that carries it within minutes directly to the cells, protecting it from the destructive elements of the digestive system. Altrient C is the most effective option for ensuring your body has adequate vitamin C levels.


Directions
Take 1-2 sachets a day
Does not dissolve in liquid
Do not blend, process or put in hot water
Squeeze sachet into a shot glass amount of water or juice
Best taken on an empty stomach to speed up the absorption
It can be folded gently into a yoghurt

Altrient C Nutritional Facts: 1 Sachet (5.7 mL) 30 Sachet's Per Box
Amount Per Sachet % NRV*
Vitamin C (as sodium ascorbate) 1,000 mg 1,250%
Phospholipids (from soy lecithin) 1,000 mg †
of which phosphatidylcholine 500 mg †
*Nutritional Reference Value †NRV not established

Ingredients
Deionized Water, Sodium Ascorbate, Lecithin Phospholipids (Soy), Alcohol (ethanol), Citric Acid (for pH adjustment).


Free From GMO ingredients, sugar, wheat, gluten, yeast, dairy, meat products, hexane, soy protein, artificial colours and flavours. Non-acidic and gentle on the stomach.

Storage Store in a cool, dry place, can be refrigerated.

Precautions Do not exceed the stated daily dose. Food supplements are not a substitute for a varied diet. Keep out of the reach of young children.

Most ordinary forms of oral Vitamin C – tablets, capsules, powders, liquids and even dietary sources are not metabolised efficiently due to tightly regulated absorption controls in the body. This means that levels of vitamin C in the intestines reaches saturation point at as little as 200mg. In fact, the more we take in the less we absorb. Thus, very little reaches your blood stream let alone the cells where it is needed most.

Until recently intravenous delivery of vitamin C has proven to be the most effective route for absorption, but this method is both costly and impractical. Altrient C offers the perfect solution because of its scientifically proven liposomal delivery method. This powerful form of transportation encapsulates the nutrient in a microscopic phospholipid bubble that carries it within minutes directly to the cells, protecting it from the destructive elements of the digestive system. Altrient C is the most effective option for ensuring your body has adequate vitamin C levels.


Directions

  1. Take 1-2 sachets a day
  2. Does not dissolve in liquid
  3. Do not blend, process or put in hot water
  4. Squeeze sachet into a shot glass amount of water or juice
  5. Best taken on an empty stomach to speed up the absorption
  6. It can be folded gently into a yoghurt

  • Phospholipids (from soy lecithin) 1,000 mg †
  • of which phosphatidylcholine 500 mg †
  • *Nutritional Reference Value †NRV not established


Ingredients

Deionized Water, Sodium Ascorbate, Lecithin Phospholipids (Soy), Alcohol (ethanol), Citric Acid (for pH adjustment).


Free From GMO ingredients, sugar, wheat, gluten, yeast, dairy, meat products, hexane, soy protein, artificial colours and flavours. Non-acidic and gentle on the stomach.

Storage Store in a cool, dry place, can be refrigerated.

Precautions Do not exceed the stated daily dose. Food supplements are not a substitute for a varied diet. Keep out of the reach of young children.

fields.name: Active Edge Cherry Active Concentrate 946ml
fields.description:
Active Edge Cherry Active Concentrate 946ml
CherryActive® is a 100% natural, tart Montmorency cherry concentrate. Each 946ml bottle is made from the concentrated juice of approximately 3,000 Montmorency cherries and contains no sweeteners, preservatives, flavourings or added sugar. 

Available in three bottle sizes (946ml, 473ml, 237ml) and 30ml single serving on-the-go packs, our products are chosen by consumers serious about maintaining good health and optimising their fitness training.

Active Edge recommend new customers buy an initial three-month supply of CherryActive.


Serving Suggestions
Straight up!
Mix 30ml of cherry concentrate juice into half a pint of fresh water - or dilute to taste.

As a breakfast treat
Add 30ml of CherryActive® concentrate to natural yoghurt or a breakfast smoothie.

As a recovery smoothie
Add 30ml of CherryActive® to a post training smoothie.


Ingredients
100% Montmorency Cherry Juice
